h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Worryfree Brew Location
content: Worryfree Bree can be found at The Webbed Hollow's The Verdure Bridge Shrine location. From the Shrine, continue deeper into the area, until you cross a small bridge just to the left of the Shrine. Drop down from this bridge and continue through the lower cave systems (following the flames).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Worryfree_Brew.md', within the main section titled 'Worryfree Brew', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Worryfree Brew Location'.
The content is as follows:
Worryfree Bree can be found at The Webbed Hollow's The Verdure Bridge Shrine location. From the Shrine, continue deeper into the area, until you cross a small bridge just to the left of the Shrine. Drop down from this bridge and continue through the lower cave systems (following the flames).
